He reaches to his bag, sticks the photo on top of his gear. 
Then, hefting, the bag, BOURNE strides away.                                 *

truth:
NICKY (piping in) I don't think we need to keep looking for him anyway. 
PAMELA And why is that? 
NICKY Because he's doing just what he said he'd               * do. He's coming for us. 
And for the first time they're all thinking the same thing.
